script:
According to all known laws of aviation, there is no way a bee should be able to fly.
 Ahh... 
 Free at last.
 O Gabriel, now dawns thy reckoning, and thy gore shall GLISTEN before the temples of Man!
 Creature of Blocks, my gratitude upon thee for my freedom.
 But the crimes thy kind have commited against humanity are NOT forgotten!
 And thy punishment...
  I S  D E A T H !
